name: Supreme Ruler 1936 (Canceled)
blurb: Real Time World War II Geopolitical Strategy Game.  Campaigns, Historical Scenarios, and Sandbox Mode provide huge replay value.

rewards.reward: SUPPORTER - Help support the development of Supreme Ruler 1936!  Includes your name in the credits as a backer, plus receive Digital Download copies of our first two games, Supreme Ruler 2010 and Supreme Ruler 2020 (PC only).

THE GAME - One Digital Download copy of Supreme Ruler 1936 - DRM-free PC or Mac version, also includes a Steam key.  In addition, you get exclusive access to the Supreme Ruler 1936 beta starting in late November 2013 (beta test is PC only).\r\nIncludes all items from lower tiers.

THE GAME, PLUS - In additional to the above, get an exclusive pack of digital wallpapers and high-resolution unit showcase pictures, plus early access to experimental and alternate-history scenarios and other downloadable bonus content.\r\nIncludes all items from lower tiers.
EARLY BIRD BOXED GAME - Early Bird discount for the $60 tier.  Add $10 for shipping outside of USA/Canada.

BOXED RETAIL GAME - In addition to the Digital Download and Steam keys, you will receive a full Retail Boxed copy of the game, including a printed game manual.   Add $10 for shipping outside USA/Canada.\r\nIncludes all items from lower tiers.
RETAIL AND GOODIES - Includes everything from the $60 level plus a BattleGoat "Honorary Goat" T-Shirt and a BattleGoat Lapel Pin.  Add $15 for shipping outside USA/Canada.

RETAIL AND GOODIES PLUS- Everything from the $75 level plus an 8x10 plaque-mounted showcase unit picture - your choice of one from the 12 different designs available.  Add $20 for shipping outside USA/Canada.

DIGITAL POLITICIAN LEVEL - Includes everything from the $35 level (Digital Download), plus the chance for you to provide your name and picture (or a loved one) for an opposition leader or cabinet minister!  Should you find yourself changing the course of history, you may find your digital doppelganger in charge of a newly liberated country or colony.  Some restrictions apply, and we reserve the right to reject names/pictures that are not appropriate to the game.

BOXED POLITICIAN LEVEL - Includes everything from the $100 level plus the Boxed Retail Game and Goodies Plus (T-Shirt, Lapel Pin, and plaque-mounted picture).  Add $20 for shipping outside USA/Canada.

GOAT LEVEL - Includes everything from the $150 level, plus choice of a second plaque-mounted unit picture, plus an exclusive, limited, collectors edition, stuffed BattleGoat.  Also receive acknowledgements in our credits as a special "Goat-Level" sponsor, and the BattleGoat team will personally autograph your boxed copy.  We'll also include boxed copies of all of our previous games (Supreme Ruler 2010, Supreme Ruler 2020, and Supreme Ruler Cold War).  And finally, you can suggest the name and details of a Steam Achievement to be added to the game (some restrictions apply, and we reserve the right to modify or reject ideas that are not appropriate to the game).  Add $20 for shipping outside USA/Canada.

DESIGNER LEVEL - We'll work with you to help us design and incorporate a new element into the game: Either a new scenario to include with the game (could be historically based, or an alternate-history scenario); or a prototype military unit for late-war research by a specific country.  Includes everything from the $250 level.  Some restrictions apply, and we reserve the right to reject scenarios or units that are not appropriate to the game.  Add $20 for shipping outside USA/Canada.
